mng: tired, weary, to strain, to wear out, to work hard
rope, to bind together, to twist around
to accumulate, to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4]), continuous, repeated

exm.mng: tired, exhausted, worn out, to toil
clusters of, piles of, heaps of
to be put to a lot of trouble
to get dragged into, to get involved (on sb else's account)
again and again, innumerable, repeated, riddled with, accumulated, countless
to accumulate over a long period of time
superfluous, cumbersome, a burden on sb, a nuisance to sb, to inconvenience, to tie sb down, long-winded (of writing), also written 纍墜|累坠, also pr. [léi zhui]
